name: Blue Blob
description:
Collecting more coins causes more enemies to spawn. More and more Red Blobs begin to surround Blue Blob as you progress through the level. The closer you get to victory, the closer you are to failure (unless you're very skilled and manage to collect all the coins!). Inspired by Pacman.

Wowie Jam 3.0 Entry: Failure is Progress

How to Play
Goal: Collect all coins
Controls: Blue Blob will follow your mouse cursor.

Known bugs/issues with the game:

  • The full screen button may not work on some browsers. However, it seems to work fine on Google Chrome.
  • The game doesn't seem to load in an Incognito window.
